definitions.text: become less tense, rest, or take one's ease
examples: He relaxed in the hot tub
Let's all relax after a hard day's work
relax the tension on the rope

definitions.text: become loose or looser or less tight

examples: A hot bath always relaxes me

definitions.text: become less tense, less formal, or less restrained, and assume a friendlier manner
examples: our new colleague relaxed when he saw that we were a friendly group
The government relaxed the curfew after most of the rebels were caught
The rules relaxed after the new director arrived
He slackened his pace as he got tired
gave the impression of being quite relaxed
